CustomField.formula:
(IF(CONTAINS( Onboarding_Progression__c , "Company Shell/EE Static Complete") , "√ Company Shell/EE Static Complete" &BR(), "_ Company Shell/EE Static Complete" &BR())) &
(IF(ISPICKVAL(ENS_Set_up_Mandatory__c, "No"), "n/a-ENS Set-Up" &BR(), IF(CONTAINS(Onboarding_Progression__c, "ENS Set-Up Complete"),"√ ENS Set-Up Complete" &BR(), "_ ENS Set-Up Complete" &BR())))
& (IF(ISPICKVAL(Tax_Wage_and_Balance_Manatory__c, "No"), "n/a- Tax, Wage and Balance" &BR(), IF(CONTAINS( Onboarding_Progression__c , "Tax, Wage and Balance Complete") , "√ Tax, Wage and Balance Complete" &BR(), "_ Tax, Wage and Balance Complete" &BR()))) & (IF(ISPICKVAL(Interfaces_Set_up_Mandatory__c , "No"), "n/a-Interfaces Set-Up" &BR(), IF(CONTAINS( Onboarding_Progression__c , "Interfaces Set-up Complete") , "√ Interfaces Set-up Complete" &BR(), "_ Interfaces Set-up Complete" &BR()))) & (IF(CONTAINS( Onboarding_Progression__c , "Installation and Training Complete") , "√ Installation and Training Complete" &BR(), "_ Installation and Training Complete" &BR())) & (IF (NOT(First_Payroll_has_Run__c), "_ First Payroll Processing Complete" &BR(), "√ First Payroll Processing Complete" &BR()))
CustomField.label: Onboarding Status
